data.eml:eml: Problems with the taxonomy of Phytoptus tetratrichus Nalepa 1890 (Acari: Eriophyoidea) inhabiting Tilia spp.: Analysis based on morphological variation among individuals

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Soika, Grażyna, Kozak, Marcin (2011): Problems with the taxonomy of Phytoptus tetratrichus Nalepa 1890 (Acari: Eriophyoidea) inhabiting Tilia spp.: Analysis based on morphological variation among individuals. Zootaxa 2988: 37-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278384
